name: The Wronged
luck_special: When you spend a point of Luck, you find a dangerous lead on your prey.

required_moves.name: I Know My Prey
required_moves.description: You get +1 ongoing when knowingly investigating, pursuing or fighting the breed of monster that caused your loss.

optional_moves.name: Berserk
optional_moves.description: No matter how much harm you take, you can always keep going until the current fight is over. During a fight, the Keeper may not use harm moves on you and you cannot die. When the fight ends, all harm takes effect as normal.

optional_moves.name: NEVER AGAIN
optional_moves.description: In combat, you may choose to protect someone without rolling, as if you had rolled a 10+, but you may not choose to “suffer little harm.

optional_moves.name: What Does Not Kill Me...
optional_moves.description: If you have suffered harm in a fight, you gain +1 ongoing until the fight is over.

optional_moves.name: Fervor
optional_moves.description: When you manipulate someone, roll +Tough instead of +Charm.

optional_moves.name: Safety First
optional_moves.description: You have jury-rigged extra protection into your gear, giving you +1 armour (maximum 2-armour).

optional_moves.name: DIY Surgery
optional_moves.description: When you do quick and dirty first aid on someone (including yourself ), roll +Cool. On a 10+ it’s all good, it counts as normal first aid, plus stabilize the injury and heal 1 harm. On a 7-9 it counts as normal first aid, plus one of these, your choice: Stabilise the injury but the patient takes -1 forward; Heal 1-harm and stabilise for now, but it will return as 2-harm and become unstable again later; Heal 1-harm and stabilise but the patient takes -1 ongoing until it’s fixed properly.

optional_moves.name: Tools Matter
optional_moves.description: With your signature weapon (see your gear, below), you get +1 to kick some ass.
